scripts.build: ng build ngx-pwa-offline --prod && copyfiles README.md LICENSE dist/ngx-pwa/offline
scripts.release:patch: npm run lint && npm run build && cd projects/ngx-pwa/offline && npm version patch && cd ../../.. && npm version patch && npm run build && npm publish dist/ngx-pwa/offline --access public && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:minor: npm run lint && npm run build && cd projects/ngx-pwa/offline && npm version minor && cd ../../.. && npm version minor && npm run build && npm publish dist/ngx-pwa/offline --access public && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:major: npm run lint && npm run build && cd projects/ngx-pwa/offline && npm version major && cd ../../.. && npm version major && npm run build && npm publish dist/ngx-pwa/offline --access public && git push && git push --tags
